io.sarl.util

Interface OpenEventSpace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventSpace, Space
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventSpaceImpl

    public interface OpenEventSpace
extends EventSpace
    Event driven interaction space where agent are free register and unregister themselves. Agents should only register once in this type of space.
    Version:
    0.9.0 2019-04-15 23:03:09
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.util

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address register(entity : EventListener)
      Registers the entity inside this space.
      Address unregister(entity : EventListener)
      Unregisters the entity inside this space.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.sarl.lang.core.EventSpace

        emit, emit, emit, emit, getAddress

      • Methods inherited from interface io.sarl.lang.core.Space

        getID, getParticipants, getSpaceID

    • Method Detail

      • register

        def register(entity : EventListener) : Address 
        Description copied from interface: OpenEventSpace
        Registers the entity inside this space. After registering a new agent, the Space should emit a MemberJoined event where the source is the address of the newly registered agent.

        If the agent is already registered the address is return, but the listener is not replaced.

        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to register.
        Returns:
        the entity's address in this space

      • unregister

        def unregister(entity : EventListener) : Address 
        Description copied from interface: OpenEventSpace
        Unregisters the entity inside this space. Before unregistering an agent, the Space should emit a MemberLeft event where the source is the address of the unregistered agent.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to unregister.
        Returns:
        the former entity's address
